cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)
project(jadesoul)

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++0x")

#add_subdirectory
add_subdirectory(sentence_alignment sentence_alignment_dir)

#include_directories
include_directories(../../../include)
